title: If Kalista had a TV show named after her...

replies.body: If{{champion:119}} had a TV show, it would be called "The Amazing World of Drravven." It would also be the only show on that channel. Actually, it would probably be the only channel too.
You mean Disney's That's So Draven.

Totally came here to post that one. Darn.

Quick, what else is there... Breaking Brand? 7th Hecarim? Twitch... dot TV? {{summoner:4}}

It's Always Sunny in Demacia. Shadow Isles Horror Story. Teen Warwick. Vayne the Vampire Slayer. The Walking Zed. Purple is the new Black: Starring Lulu. How I met your Jungler. Nidalee Town (Cougar Town) The Suite Life of Jinx and Vi. Mighty Morphin Power Rengars. Morgana, the Teenage Witch. Everbody hates Teemo. and my favorite Leave it to Scuttlecrab.
I got a few AA in, but you just ulted.
Ahahaha, BarkWhalberg still trumps anything I could come up with pun-wise. I just love silly puns.
You and I both.
Well, maybe I can come up with some puns after finals and a special email I'm hoping for on the 15th, until then I can't be too silly.

Disney would also run Ziggie McWire, Annie Montana, and Wizards of Nidalee Place.

Joystick Jung sorta stole all the thunder.
And Gnar's show would be called ZabooGnarfoo. He would be the mascot, and Nidalee and Udyr would co-host it.

> And Gnar's show would be called ZabooGnarfoo. He would be the mascot, and Nidalee and Udyr would co-host it.

D'awww. The real Zaboomafoo passed away a few weeks ago. :c

Indeed. Hence the homage.

Speaking of homage, I think Mister Braum's Neighborhood would be the best thing since aerosol whipped cream.

I would watch that!
He'd be so inspiring as with the real one.

Oh man, upvote because I used to loveeee Clarissa Explains It All.

Na na, na na na. Na na na na na....
I'm so glad some people get it. I was afraid they wouldn't. Makes me feel old... <3
{{champion:44}} would be the host of the Truly Outrageous Shopping Network
Haha, I...don't get it. I don't get it.

Nah 
it would odviously be called Kalifornia girls
